description: all: clean up C function prototypes

messages.text:
On Mon, Feb 11, 2013 at 2:27 AM, Anthony Martin <ality@pbrane.org> wrote:
>
> A few files in test/bench/shootout could be changed
> to use our style but I decided against it.
>
They are external code so i agree with you. let's wait for rsc.

Hello minux.ma@gmail.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

By the way, semantic transformation tools can be quite useful
for this type of task; a good example is Coccinelle:

https://github.com/coccinelle/coccinelle

On 10 February 2013 10:31, minux <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:
>
> On Mon, Feb 11, 2013 at 2:27 AM, Anthony Martin <ality@pbrane.org> wrote:
>>
>> A few files in test/bench/shootout could be changed
>> to use our style but I decided against it.
>
> They are external code so i agree with you. let's wait for rsc.
>
> --
>
> ---
> You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups
> "golang-dev" group.
> To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an
> email to golang-dev+unsubscribe@googlegroups.com.
> For more options, visit https://groups.google.com/groups/opt_out.
>
>
LGTM if you're sure you've fixed all the problems :-)

PTAL

I added the changes to the new runtime/cgo/gcc_netbsd_arm.c file.

On Tue, Feb 19, 2013 at 5:55 PM, Anthony Martin <ality@pbrane.org> wrote:

> minux <minux.ma@gmail.com> once said:
> > On Mon, Feb 11, 2013 at 2:27 AM, Anthony Martin <ality@pbrane.org>
> wrote:
> > >
> > > A few files in test/bench/shootout could be changed
> > > to use our style but I decided against it.
> > >
> > They are external code so i agree with you. let's wait for rsc.
>
> Russ, do you want me to also change the files in
> test/bench/shootout?
>

I would imagine not, since they're not our code.   I think those are all
just mirrors of upstream's shootout code.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=646803253bb4 ***
